scripts.bump-patch: npm version patch -m 'Version bump to %s.' && echo 'Bump index.js and bookmark.js!'
scripts.bump-minor: npm version minor -m 'Version bump to %s.' && echo 'Bump index.js and bookmark.js!'
scripts.bump-major: npm version major -m 'Version bump to %s.' && echo 'Bump index.js and bookmark.js!'
